title: Admonition to Doctor Burges, and to those who either compos'd or caused to be re-printed, that seditious pamphlet, entituled, The common-prayer-book unmasked and to all others, who endeavour to maintain that factious opinion, that the use of the liturgie of the Church of England, is sinfull / Edmund Elis ...
author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Matthew Inman, for James Magnes ...,
